name: Gillat Kol
content: Gillat Kol CS Skip to main content Gillat Kol Associate Professor Contact Building 316 Computer Science Envelope gkol@cs.princeton.edu Phone (609) 258-5386 Diploma Ph.D., Weizmann Institute, 2013 Research Areas Theory Short Bio Gillat Kol joined the Princeton faculty in 2016 after postdoctoral positions at the Institute for Advanced Study and the Technion - Israel Institute of Technology. She completed her Ph.D. at the Weizmann Institute. Her work has been recognized by an NSF CAREER Award and a Sloan Research Fellowship. She has won multiple teaching awards from Princeton's School of Engineering and Applied Science.Â Full list of publications.
